function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exaggerated information about COVID-19","Impact":"Misleading public and healthcare decisions","Mitigation":"Ensure communication is based on verified and credible sources","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools and platforms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Media organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Spread of fake news and misinformation","Impact":"Fueling conspiracy theories and vaccine denial","Mitigation":"Promote critical thinking and media literacy","Technologies":"Social media fact-checking algorithms, digital news verification tools","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Social media platforms, news organizations"},{"Description":"Withdrawn scientific papers causing confusion","Impact":"Spread of false information despite retractions","Mitigation":"Promote scientific rigor in publishing, verify claims before dissemination","Technologies":"Peer-review systems, plagiarism detection software","People":"Researchers, journalists, public health authorities","Owner":"Academic journals, scientific publishers"}]}
